articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The gaming gateway eschews Apple's fee model in favor of monetizing "convenience features."
articles.title: Former Metamask Lead Releases HyperPlay Web3 Game Launcher

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The plan would see Binance's U.S. entity acquire Voyager Digital's assets for $1.02 billion, a deal outlined back in December.
articles.title: Voyager Clients Vote 97% in Favor of $1B Restructuring Plan

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: The federated spin-off Bluesky backed by the Twitter founder is now on the App store, but users need to invite to try the beta.
articles.title: Decentralized Twitter Spin-Off Bluesky Now on App Store as Beta

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: Stepn’s COO said that the app will be rolling out new features soon after what has been a bumpy ride for the project.
articles.title: Move-to-Earn App Stepn to Launch Suite of New Features ‘Soon’: COO

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Crypto derivatives platform LedgerX told customers it would now be using Signature Bank for its domestic wire transfers.
articles.title: FTX Survivor LedgerX Dumps Silvergate for Signature Bank: Report

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: New entrants to the French market will face stricter regulations, but existing players will have more time to comply.
articles.title: France Moves Ahead With Tighter Crypto Rules for New Entrants

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The right to digital ownership is just one piece of the open metaverse. Users must also be able to bring their assets wherever they want.
articles.title: The Metaverse Needs to Be 'Open' Unlike Fortnite, Roblox: The Sandbox COO

articles.description: Sebastien Borget, founder and COO of the metaverse realm The Sandbox, sat down wit Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the future of the open metaverse and true digital ownership, what's next for The Sandbox, and its current user numbers and stats.
articles.title: Founder of The Sandbox: 'Essential' to Metaverse That Users Own Their Digital Content

articles.description: Playboy's Web3 lead Liz Suman sat down with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris to tell the story of how the 70-year-old magazine brand got into Web3 and preview its upcoming MetaMansion in The Sandbox, which will give special access privileges to those with a Playboy Rabbitar NFT.
articles.title: Playboy's Next Step in Web3: MetaMansion in The Sandbox

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The exchange’s Ethereum Layer-2 network is aimed at courting developers of decentralized applications.
articles.title: Coinbase Shares Up 6% Since Unveiling Layer-2 Ethereum Network Base

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The digital entertainment platform plans to expand its already notable offerings.
articles.title: Orange Comet Raises Over $7 Million in New Funding for NFT Media Play

articles.description: Dave Broome, CEO of NFT design and production studio Orange Comet, spoke to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris about how his company takes "large, popular IP" and turns it into NFT content and Web3 worlds around it.
articles.title: Orange Comet CEO: 'We're Trying to Build the Disney of Web3'

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: A leading NFT analytics platform has flagged 80% of recent trades on Blur as “inorganic,” but is it really wash trading?
articles.title: How Much Wash Trading Is Really Happening on Blur?

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The payments giant still wants to grow its digital asset department, according to the company's head of crypto.
articles.title: Visa Says It's Not Slowing Down Plans for Crypto Products

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The 3D gaming tech company is highlighting Web3 tools for its massive game developer community.
articles.title: Game Engine Unity Adds Verified Web3 Toolbox for MetaMask, Solana, Dapper Labs

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Nishad Singh is the latest high-level employee at FTX to plead guilty to criminal charges.
articles.title: Former FTX Director Pleads Guilty to Fraud—SEC, CFTC File Civil Charges

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: Decrypt spent some quality time with Ledger’s new crypto hardware wallet at NFT Paris. Here are our first impressions.
articles.title: Ledger Stax Hands-On Review: A Hardware Wallet With iPod Design Flourishes

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Billed as Mario Kart meets Call of Duty Zombies, “Undead Blocks” is a cross-platform shoot-em-up with guns as NFTs.
articles.title: Ex-Goldman Sachs Analyst Releases Kill-to-Earn Zombie Game 'Undead Blocks' on ImmutableX

articles.description: Worldwide Webb is a gaming realm that lets you turn your NFT PFPs (Punks, Apes, Doodles and so on) into playable avatars. Founder Thomas Webb spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about how the game works, the $10m Series A funding it just received, and why he expects we'll soon see NFT games that show what NFT gaming can do in its best form.
articles.title: Worldwide Web Founder: What NFT Gaming 'Should Be and Will Be'

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The Algorand Foundation’s CTO said the exploit was “not the result of an underlying issue with the Algorand protocol or SDK.”
articles.title: Algorand Wallet MyAlgo Urges Users to Withdraw Funds After $9.2M Exploit

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: “Avalon” aims to be a AAA interoperable gameworld with blockchain elements.
articles.title: Ex-Electronic Arts, Sony Game Developers Raise $13 Million For 'Avalon' Digital Universe

articles.author: Max Koopsen
articles.description: The gaming community hasn't shown much affection for NFTs, but the Worldwide Webb founder thinks that could soon change.
articles.title: NFT Games 'Aren't Just About Minting': WorldWide Webb Founder

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Term Labs is building out a key primitive for the DeFi space, allowing crypto projects to lock in fixed rates on their idle holdings.
articles.title: Term Labs Raises $2.5M to Build Out Fixed-Rate Product for DeFi

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Sepolia is the second Ethereum testnet to see a dress rehearsal for Shanghai, which will finally let users withdraw their staked ETH.
articles.title: Ethereum Edges Closer to Letting Users Withdraw Staked ETH

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Terawulf’s newest nuclear-powered Bitcoin miner in Pennsylvania isn’t the firm’s first attempt at going green.
articles.title: TeraWulf’s Nuclear Bitcoin Plant Is Just One Piece of the Green Mining Puzzle

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Miner fees have tanked from $170K to $11K in less than two weeks—but a new Yuga Labs project may rekindle things.
articles.title: Bitcoin NFT Mints Surpass 200K—But Is Interest in Ordinals Fading?

articles.description: Animoca Brands chairman Yat Siu spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about the open metaverse, NFTs and gaming, building through a bear market, and why Animoca believes the future of the industry is culture and gaming.
articles.title: Yat Siu of Animoca Brands: 'The Future of Crypto and Web3 Is Culture'

articles.description: Shiti Manghani, COO of Stepn, the app that lets users earn tokens for exercising, spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about Stepn's current health, its plans to addnew achievement systems for the top users, and parent company Finding Satoshi Labs and its plans to launch more apps.
articles.title: COO of Move-to-Earn App STEPN: 'We're Thriving, Not Just Surviving'

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: TwelveFold, a limited series of just 300 generative Ordinals NFT art pieces on Bitcoin, will be auctioned later this week.
articles.title: Bored Ape Yacht Club Creator Yuga Labs Reveals First Bitcoin NFT Project

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The SEC hit Robinhood with a subpoena in December regarding the company's crypto listings and custody of assets, the firm disclosed today.
articles.title: Robinhood Faces SEC Investigation Over Crypto Business

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: “Fortnite” esports star Mongraal has accepted a 1,000 ETH bid for his NFT after achieving the highest score on Yuga Labs’ game.
articles.title: Winning ‘Dookey Dash’ Key NFT Sells to Billionaire for $1.63 Million in Ethereum

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Despite the NFT backlash, the ex-YouTube Gaming head believes that gamers will eventually embrace Web3.
articles.title: Gamers Will Drive Web3 Adoption: Polygon Labs President Ryan Wyatt

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The breakout success of the Blur marketplace and a new Yuga Labs title are likely moving the needle.
articles.title: Ethereum Gas Fees Are Slowly Climbing as NFT Market Rebounds

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Two days after a major outage, the Solana Foundation says it’s still investigating why the network went down for almost 20 hours.
articles.title: Solana Foundation Still Doesn’t Know What Caused Weekend Network Outage

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The announcement comes weeks after Paxos disclosed regulatory trouble that centered around the Binance-branded stablecoin.
articles.title: Coinbase to Delist Binance USD Stablecoin Amid Regulatory Scrutiny

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The NFT space is a much bigger picture than just the recent Blur versus OpenSea controversy, according to SuperRare founder Jonathan Perkins.
articles.title: NFT Royalties Are 'Not Going Away on SuperRare': Co-Founder Jon Perkins

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Access to the MetaMansion will be open to users without a Rabbitar, but they won't be able to access all the “cool places" in the virtual world.
articles.title: Playboy Expects to Launch MetaMansion Virtual World This Year

articles.author: Max Koopsen,Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: With the Goerli’s native coin becoming the target of rampant speculation, one Ethereum developer said it’s time to pack it in.
articles.title: Ethereum Developers to Let Goerli Testnet ‘Slowly Die’ as Coin Price Soars

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The IMF wants to see more regulation of digital assets, but still says there could even be an outright ban on cryptocurrencies.
articles.title: Banning Crypto 'Should Not Be Taken Off The Table': IMF

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Yat Siu described royalties as the gas that keep an economy of creators humming.
articles.title: Maximizing Profits Will ‘Kill’ Web3: Animoca Brands Chairman

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The blockchain developer says its new tool can spin up decentralized applications in 4 minutes.
articles.title: Alchemy Launches Dapp Builder for the Next Billion Web3 Developers

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Emin Gün Sirer said Sam Bankman-Fried’s alleged fraud tarnished the crypto industry’s goodwill.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Did ‘Immeasurable’ Damage to Crypto Industry: Ava Labs CEO

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Plus several people tweeted their concern that upstart NFT marketplace Blur is currently dominated by a handful of pro traders.
articles.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: NFT Community Wants Creator Royalties Back

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Blockchain.com says the claim is “completely meritless and a work of fiction.”
articles.title: CoinFLEX Claims Blockchain.com Owes Over $4.3M in FLEX

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: American sculptor Tom Sach said he is much more focused on pushing the limits of his creative process than the associations of Web3 terms.
articles.title: Crypto Terms Are 'in a Lot of Ways Poisoned' Says Artist Tom Sachs

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: With the industry reeling from last year's events, Doodles CEO Julian Holguin says events like NFT Paris can also be a much-needed refuge.
articles.title: ‘Most Projects Are Not Going to Make It’ : Doodles CEO

articles.description: Polygon Labs President Ryan Wyatt, the former YouTube Gaming head, helped turn Polygon into one of the crypto industry’s rare winners in 2022. In a lively chat with Dan Roberts and Andrew Hayward, he revealed why the promise of digital ownership pushed him from the gaming world into crypto, and how Polygon has pulled giants like Starbucks, Reddit, and Instagram into Web3. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Ryan Wyatt on Polygon’s Winning Streak

articles.description: NFTs take over Paris on February 23. Decrypt's Stephen Graves interviews NFT Paris founder Alexandre Tsydenkov about this year's conference, which features speakers from many of the top collections and companies in the space, plus lots of side events. Decrypt will be on hand as a media partner, conducting interviews and moderating panels. See you in France!
articles.title: NFT Paris Founder Alexandre Tsydenkov Previews 2023 Event

articles.description: Paul Bettner tells Decrypt about the challenges he faced while developing his Web3 game "Wildcard."
articles.title: 'Words with Friends' Creator Paul Bettner: Web3 Can Solve Twitch's Limitations

articles.description: Paul Bettner shares his perspective on Web3 gaming platforms and his vision to make games everywhere and anywhere players want them.
articles.title: 'Words with Friends' Creator Paul Bettner on Why He's Building His Next Game 'Wildcard' in Web3

articles.description: In our February 11, 2023 week in review episode, Matthew Diemer, Stacy Elliott, and Stephen Graves talk about the latest developments in the FTX case, 3AC founders trying for a comeback, a16z losing on a big Uniswap vote despite holding 15 million UNI tokens, and NFTs roaring back with CryptoPunks, Bored Apes, and Ordinals NFTs selling hot. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm Week in Review: SEC Targets Staking, a16z Doesn’t Get Its Way, NFTs Popping

articles.description: Comedic legend Bill Murray sits down with Decrypt at his first exclusive party for NFT holders in Oceanside, California. He describes the project’s origins and why it didn’t feel “mercenary” for him to create an NFT-based membership club.
articles.title: Bill Murray Discusses NFT Project, First Members-Only Event

articles.description: Kristin Smith is Executive Director of the Blockchain Association, which advocates for crypto policy in Washington D.C.—an exhausting effort that Sam Bankman-Fried was closely involved in, until he set it all on fire. Kristin tells Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott how SBF and FTX set things back, but there are still positive signs from crypto friendly voices in Congress. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Kristin Smith and the Crypto Crusade in Washington
